bike.description: Specialized FACT 10r carbon, FACT IS construction, tapered/shaped 1-1/8" to size specific lower HT, compact race design, Zertz, internal cable routing, OSBB

components.description: Roubaix size specific, FACT carbon full monocoque, Zertz
1-1/8" upper and size specific lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings, 20mm carbon cone spacer and 20mm of carbon spacers
Carbon chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
